attributes.action: People's vote of no confidence in the UK Government and general election.
attributes.additional_details: This current Government have not only failed in every test posed it in under a year in power, it is attempting to renage on the key promises made to win it's power. From not honouring the withdrawal agreement that was meant to deliver a deal to leave the EU, to the extra nurses and police offiicers. They latest debacle over A level results should never have happened when the schools had been closed for four months prior to this. With clear guidance from Government the disaster could be avoided
attributes.background: As the Parliamentary model for bringing a Governement to book cannot be exercised due to the high majority won at the last election, we need the government to acept that the people have no confidence in them and they should stand aside  and an emergency General Election be called.
